journals.notes:
All SQL files must be located in com_easysdi_core ; it seems that some old files still exist in other components... 

the review should include a complete cleaning

on MySQL, coming from old install, it seems that some(many) constraints have an autogenerated name which can't be used in any statement.
this constraints should be altered in order to their names reflect the ones given in install script.

Do we have a reflexion on the constraint name ? (open question)
=> actually, for the foreign key, the constraint name is _tblname_fkX_ (where X is an incremented int)
Altering some constraint name, I would suggest to have this reflexion and propose the following structured name : _tableName_fieldName_fk_refTableName_refFieldName_
TC has reject this as an enhacement.
